title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
OB: When using the expression 'new Date('3/2/2005')' as a value in a table filter, an error message is displayed.
EB: The system should handle the expression 'new Date('3/2/2005')' as a valid date value in the table filter without throwing an error message.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Create a new datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column.
2. Insert a table and create a filter based on the datetime column.
3. In the value field of the filter, input the expression 'new Date('3/2/2005')'.
